Html:
How I can clear Cach?

I know that in the demo project there is a button ClearAll, it deletes all the files simply, I believe this is not acceptable.
Another mechanism nenashel I just write my function to delete all records from the database, it will help me?

Using WinForms, example code to do this is:

MyMapControl.Manager.ImageCacheLocal.DeleteOlderThan(DateTime.Today.AddDays(1));

This will delete any cached data that is older than tommorrow (which is everything).

MyMapControl would be your GMapControl object.
